title: Green River Overlook
description:
From the "Island in the Sky" section of Canyonlands National Park, Utah USA
	11 Jun 2013
	
	The tiny trail in the distance is actually the "White Rim Road", part of a 100 mile (160km) four wheel drive road that loops around the Island in the Sky section of Canyonlands.
author: Gordon Cottrell
generated_description: A sweeping vista from Green River Overlook in the Island in the Sky section of Canyonlands National Park, Utah. The distant White Rim Road appears as a thin trail threading through the desert landscape, part of a challenging 100-mile four-wheel drive loop. This elevated perspective reveals the vast scale and rugged beauty of the Colorado Plateau's canyon country.
